East Coast MP Dana Kirkpatrick pushing to legalise drinks at hair salonshttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/east-coast-mp-dana-kirkpatrick-pushing-to-legalise-drinks-at-hairdresser/GRV3C5TBNVB7VBQDT2DLRAHNSA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/east-coast-mp-dana-kirkpatrick-pushing-to-legalise-drinks-at-hairdresser/GRV3C5TBNVB7VBQDT2DLRAHNSA/ James PocockMP wants to trim an absurd law with her member's bill. Thu, 28 Nov 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Mane Street hairstylists Rachelle Cumming Cherie Gaukrodger, Sarah Kent with Dana Kirkpatrick. Kirkpatrick’s Hairdressing (Reducing Restrictions) Legislation Bill would remove restrictions on serving beverages at salons or barbers.
